trans-unit.source: Represents the center panel of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 控件的中间面板。

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用顶部、 底部、 左侧和右侧面板的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>来保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> to hold controls other than these.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>来保存这些以外的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
The edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 控件绑定到的容器的边缘并确定控件如何随其父级一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
<see langword="true" /> to enable automatic scrolling; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用自动滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: 任何子控件和可滚动父控件边界之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The minimum size of the auto-scroll.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
<see langword="true" /> to enable automatic sizing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用自动调整大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The mode by which the content panel automatically resizes itself.
trans-unit.target: 内容面板自动调整大小所使用的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.

Overridden to ensure that the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> reflects the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 已重写，以确保 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> 的背景色反映 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure representing the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 结构，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的背景色。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
<see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件引发验证操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This event is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
Occurs when the content panel loads.
trans-unit.target: 在加载内容面板时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> named `ToolStripContentPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>名为`ToolStripContentPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: 控件左上角相对于其容器左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The size that is the upper limit that GetPreferredSize can specify.
trans-unit.target: GetPreferredSize 可以指定的上限大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The size that is the lower limit that GetPreferredSize can specify.
trans-unit.target: GetPreferredSize 可以指定的下限大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The name of the control.
This property is not relevant to this class.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>, which contains all the information necessary to render the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanelRenderEventArgs>，其中包含呈现所需的所有信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来自定义 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> 的外观的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> that handles painting.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.Renderer" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> named `ToolStripContentPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>名为`ToolStripContentPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the painting styles to be applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> 的绘制样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> values.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The tab order of the control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 容器内控件的 Tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.

This event is not relevant for this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.

trans-unit.target: 如果可以通过 Tab 键定位 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
